channel.title: Diffusion on Gavin Yue
channel.description: Recent content in Diffusion on Gavin Yue

item.title: DiffSeg: Controllable Diffusion for Weakly Supervised Fibrosis Segmentation
item.description:
DiffSeg is a novel diffusion-based framework for weakly supervised semantic segmentation of fibrotic lung disease (FLD), developed as part of my research at Imperial College London. This work was accepted at ISBI 2025 and co-authored with researchers from the Bioengineering Department and the National Heart and Lung Institute.

ðŸ”¬ Motivation

Fibrotic lung disease manifests in complex, irregular patterns on HRCT scans, posing significant challenges for manual annotation due to high interobserver variability. Existing segmentation methods either require extensive pixel-level labels or struggle with fine-grained boundary detection.
